channel.description: Adafy Oy news and updates. Adafy does Windows Phone, Windows 8 and Windows Azure developments.

item.title: Welcome to Adafy.com!
item.description: Welcome to our new site. From here you can find our apps and latest news. We're soon going to announce our first Windows 8 application and more, so remember to signup for our newsletter.

item.title: Our first Windows 8 app Viihde now available from Store
item.description: Our first Windows 8 app is now available from the Windows Store! The app is an unofficial Elisa Viihde client, aimed for subscribers of the Elisa Viihde service. With the app you can browse TV guide, add recordings, check the latest movies from Video On Demand and do much more.

item.title: Our second Windows 8 app Aukio now available from Store
item.description:
Aukio is a Finnish newsreader app for Windows 8 and Windows RT -platforms. It offers news from over 200 different sources, including content like IT, sports and local news. It's a fast and smooth app and plays to the strengths of the new Windows operating systems.

Learn more.

Download it free from the Windows Store.
